propositions.text: The document is titled '杀手也穿越系列之媚者无情'.
The document contains a numbered list of sections.
The first numbered section is '1. 杀手1'.
Following '1. 杀手1' are repeated instances of '“你……”'.
The document also contains a list of chapter titles.
The chapter titles are structured as 'N. [Title]'.
The first chapter title is '1. 凤舞九天'.
Subsequent chapter titles follow a pattern of '凤凰涅槃', '凤凰展翅', and '凤凰归来', repeating this sequence.

hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a main title, followed by a section '1. 杀手1' with repetitive dialogue. Subsequently, it presents a structured list of chapter titles, starting with specific titles and then entering a repeating sequence of '凤凰展翅' and '凤凰归来'.
